name: Fenrir's Lifts 'n Ladders Library Module
description:
This mod is a library,
It's designed to add a modular elevator or ladder system to traverse new areas / floors.

If you have any feedback send it in #mods-discussion and ping me,
or open an issue on [url]https://github.com/FenrirTheWolf/BDCC-Mods/issues[/url].
author: Fenrir
